definition: to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: I would love to hear anyone else’s thoughts about library cards.
sentences.chinese: 我很願意聽到任何人關於借書證的想法。

sentences.english: I don’t have a library card, but do you mind if I check you out?
sentences.chinese: 我沒有借書證，但是你介意我支付你嗎？

sentences.english: He must renew his library card  this week.
sentences.chinese: 他必須在本週內更換他的借書證。

sentences.english: I'd like to apply for a library card.
The requirements writer is unaware that a library card is not necessary for the check-in transaction.
sentences.chinese: 作家不知道要求一個借書證沒有必要手續的交易。

sentences.english: We just can’t imagine someone not wanting to steal something so great as a library card.
sentences.chinese: 我們無法想象，有人會不想偷借書證這麼重要的東西。

sentences.english: Show me your library card, please.
sentences.chinese: 請給我出示你的借書證。

sentences.english: Your phone number on your library card correct?
sentences.chinese: 你在借書證上的電話號碼是正確的嗎？

sentences.english: You can borrow books from the library, but you can't borrow one without a library card.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在圖書館借書，但是沒有借書證就借不到。

sentences.english: Can I have your library card?
sentences.chinese: 我能用一下你的借書證嗎？

sentences.english: To borrow books, all you should do is (to) apply for a library card.
sentences.chinese: 要借書的話，你所應該做的就是申請一張借書證。

sentences.english: I wonder if you'd let me use your card?
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你可否讓我用一用你的借書證？

sentences.english: You must present your library tic ket every time you borrow books.
sentences.chinese: 你每次借書都必須出示借書證。

sentences.english: If you live anywhere in San Mateo County, applying for a library card is simple.
sentences.chinese: 如果您住在聖馬刁縣內，您便可很容易的申請借書證。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I'd like to apply for a library card.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我想申請一張借書證。

definition: (of a student) to work part-time (while continuing one's studies)/(of a delinquent) to be reformed through work and study
to have a pair of prescription glasses made
student who also works part-time/(old) reform-school student
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
